description: Taxonomic identification and abundance counts of cryptic coral-associated fauna and invertebrates (CAFI) extracted from 60 Pocillopora coral colonies. Includes full taxonomic hierarchy from WoRMS, organism counts, body size measurements, and sampling metadata. Data from initial (2019) and final (2021) sampling periods.
notes: Primary CAFI dataset for Maatea Size experiment. 8965 records of individual organisms identified to species level where possible.

description: Taxonomic identification and abundance counts of CAFI from 114 Pocillopora coral colonies across multiple sites around Mo'orea. Baseline survey characterizing natural variation in CAFI communities. Includes full WoRMS taxonomic hierarchy and body size measurements.
notes: Primary CAFI dataset for survey. 3989 organism records from observational sampling.

description: Taxonomic identification and abundance counts of CAFI from 54 Pocillopora coral colonies in density manipulation experiment. Final sampling (May 2021) after 17-month experimental period. Includes full WoRMS taxonomic hierarchy and body size measurements.
notes: Primary CAFI dataset for MRB Amount experiment. 4119 organism records.

description: Coral tissue physiology measurements including protein content (Bradford assay), carbohydrate content (phenol-sulfuric acid assay), and zooxanthellae density (hemocytometer counts). Normalized to coral surface area. Data from both 2019 and 2021 sampling periods.
notes: Primary physiology data for Maatea Size experiment. 118 coral samples analyzed.

description: Coral tissue physiology measurements (protein, carbohydrates, zooxanthellae density) from 108 Pocillopora coral colonies. Single time point survey sampling in summer 2019.
notes: Primary physiology data for survey. 108 coral samples.

description: Coral tissue physiology measurements from MRB Amount density manipulation experiment. Includes protein, carbohydrates, zooxanthellae density, and ash-free dry weight. Data from final sampling (2021).
notes: Primary physiology data for MRB Amount experiment. 53 coral samples.

description: 3D photogrammetry measurements of coral colony size and shape from Structure-from-Motion (SfM) reconstruction. Includes surface area (cm²), max/min height (cm), and volume (cm³). December 2019 initial measurements.
notes: Initial photogrammetry for Maatea Size. 58 colonies measured. Heights relative to reference plane (negative values valid).

description: 3D photogrammetry measurements of coral colony size and shape. May 2021 final measurements for growth comparison with December 2019 data.
notes: Final photogrammetry for Maatea Size. 59 colonies measured.

description: CLEANED photogrammetry measurements for analysis. 3D SfM measurements of coral surface area, height, and volume. Contains data from both December 2019 (initial) and May 2021 (final) with sampling_date column.
notes: USE THIS FILE for analysis. 108 rows (54 corals × 2 time points).

description: RAW technical output from Agisoft Metashape photogrammetry processing. Contains multiple model types (open/closed mesh) and version information. Use *_measures_* file for analysis.
notes: Raw 200K mesh output. 264 rows. Supplemental to cleaned *_measures_* file.

description: Calculated coral growth metrics showing change in surface area and height between December 2019 and May 2021 sampling periods. Derived from photogrammetry measurements.
notes: Growth calculations for 54 corals. Negative delta values indicate shrinkage (valid biological data).

description: Quality-controlled subset of growth data excluding colonies with model issues or mortality. 44 of 54 colonies included.
notes: QC-filtered subset. Supplemental to main growth file.

description: Fish community observations around experimental coral colonies. Includes species identification, abundance counts, body size, and behavioral classification (resident vs transient). Data from both 2019 and 2021 surveys.
notes: Fish survey data linked to CAFI and coral data via coral_id. 4581 fish observations.

description: Fish community observations around experimental coral colonies in MRB Amount density experiment. Final survey (May 2021) including species, abundance, and body size.
notes: Fish survey data for MRB experiment. 999 observations.

description: Field measurements of coral colony characteristics including size (length, width, height, circumference), morphotype, branching pattern, depth, and GPS coordinates. Includes neighborhood analysis of surrounding coral density.
proposed_bco_dmo_dataset: Dataset 5: Coral Characteristics and Experimental Design
notes: Detailed coral morphometrics with spatial context. 114 colonies. Contains lat/long coordinates.

description: Colony size measurements in wide format for Maatea Size experiment. Includes initial and final measurements for growth calculations.
proposed_bco_dmo_dataset: Dataset 5: Coral Characteristics and Experimental Design
notes: Colony measurements for 60 experimental corals.

description: Treatment assignments for Maatea Size experiment. Links coral_id to experimental factors: size class (thin/medium/thick) and CAFI treatment (CAFI present/removed). Grid position information for spatial analysis.
proposed_bco_dmo_dataset: Dataset 5: Coral Characteristics and Experimental Design
notes: Treatment metadata for 60 corals across 945 observation time points.

description: Treatment assignments for MRB Amount density experiment. Links coral_id to density treatment (low/medium/high = 1/3/6 corals per array). Amount treatment indicates CAFI removal percentage (0%/50%/100%).
proposed_bco_dmo_dataset: Dataset 5: Coral Characteristics and Experimental Design
notes: Treatment metadata for 54 corals.

description: Grid position and treatment assignments for MRB Amount experiment. Maps coral_id to spatial position within experimental array.
proposed_bco_dmo_dataset: Dataset 5: Coral Characteristics and Experimental Design
notes: Spatial metadata supplementing treatment file.

description: Metadata for genetic tissue samples collected from experimental coral colonies. Includes collection date, sample ID, storage information. DNA not yet sequenced - metadata only.
notes: Excel file. Sample tracking metadata for 60 coral tissue samples.

description: Detailed photogrammetry measurements from summer 2019 in Excel format. Contains additional technical parameters not in summary CSV files.
notes: Excel file with extended photogrammetry parameters.

description: Supplementary comparison study examining differences between coral branch tips and stumps. Small subset of 21 samples for methodological validation.
notes: Excel file. Methodological supplemental data.

description: Zooxanthellae cell counts from tip vs stump comparison study. 108 count replicates supporting methodological validation.
notes: Excel file. Supplemental zoox counts.

description: Manual field measurements of coral colony dimensions. Supplementary to photogrammetry data for validation.
notes: Excel file. Manual measurements for 54 corals.
